title: PBE Sign up?
body:
Why i cant sign up to PBE?
When i try to sign up it always says "something went wrong"
Is the PBE sign up closed? if not why is this happening?

replies.body: You may be using the wrong URL or region to sign up, which can result in an error.  I recommend logging out of the site completely, then going directly to the [EUNE league ](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/)page to log back in.  After you login, access the direct[ EUNE PBE](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) page.  Hope that helps!
I've done all that and still get the same error (I'm trying on EUW)

Whenever I check if I've been accepted into the pbe it gets me to re-apply. I'm afraid this is making it so I don't get in. I am trying to become a YouTubeer, but I want to make pbe videos. It would be dope if I could get in. My YouTube channel is the same as my league user name
